TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
Spread.Views allows you to define the columns during grid initialization. This allows you to choose which column to show and also in which order. This also gives you control over each column's width, caption, visibility etc..

You can also stretch the column to fill the available space in the grid by using '*' (astrik) so that there is no empty space in display.
